name: Indecisive Powers
description:
Indesecive is a game about a mage who is in the early process of learning about his powers, however, his powers seem to have a mind of their own, and are uncertain of if they like the mage or not.

These powers stay with the mage for 30 seconds, but then dissapear for 10 seconds, soon to return, but the mage doesnt know this, so all he can do during this time is run. Try and survive.
